description: Frionkandy brings to you a wide and vibrant range of quintessentially Barmeri print bed sheets at very competitive prices to suit your varying needs.Add a splash of colour to your bedroom with this beautifully designed bed linen set. The bright vibrant colour and beautiful pattern give your room a fresh look. It invites the warmth and comfort that makes your bedroom the haven you want it to be. It can easily blend with most of the decor in your room. Add this beautiful piece to your collection today and live in style every day! This bed sheet comes with two matching pillow cover. Considering environment and health hazards we have printed sheets using Azo free skin friendly colours.
